name: Freekick Old Green by ghad13
description:
This Frrekick style is based on the old version of style 9696 by user 13423. I'm using and developing it for over a year.

I'm trying to keep it looks like the old style of Freekick.org website.

It has coloring of match report implemented.


16.03.2010: Updated year color of junior's that will be youth for 2 next seasons.
18.03.2010: Repaired too wide tables (club status, national teams list).
23.03.2010: Changed new Loading bar.
30.04.2010: Repaired broken menu (orange lines) + changed look of dotted lines (menu and club status)
16.05.2010: Updated colors of not visible texts (for example: 'online').
29.05.2010: Changed message form.

06.06.2010: Not supported anymore.  INSTALL NEW VERSION: style 31418 !!
